post.text: Share this if you know someone who needs to see it. hillaryclinton.com/locate

comment.author: Katelynn
comment.text: WOW, so I was just told by a coworker that Elizabeth Warren rented buses, went to facility's for the disabled, put them on the bus and took them to vote. Half of them could barely walk and she dragged them to vote. What a disgrace you democrates are. Anything for a vote. If she wins you got what you voted for so no complaining.

replies.author: Abegail
replies.text: tough choice - on rump's side you've got the folks who want to repeal the 19th amendment and the KKK...on Hillary's side you've got the smart folks..#votedforthesmartone
